casebody.data:
ESSEX INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff,
v.
NEW JERSEY PAN-AFRICAN CHAMBER OF COMMERCE & INDUSTRY, INC., et al., Defendants,
and
Navigators Specialty Insurance Company, Defendant/Third-Party Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Scottsdale Insurance Company, Third-Party Defendant-Respondent. C-556 September Term 2017
080165 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 2, 2018 **132To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001237-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

**133It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
